ai.description: After configuring the AI assistant, it can automatically generate smart descriptions and category suggestions for your links. The Key is cached only in the current session (sessionStorage) by default and needs to be re-entered after closing the tab/browser; it will not be persisted to localStorage. If sessionStorage is unavailable (incognito/disabled), it will fall back to localStorage to avoid loss (may persist across sessions). Some OpenAI Compatible interfaces may be CORS restricted when accessed directly from the browser and will automatically proxy through the same-origin /api/ai (requires Workers/Pages deployment).
ai.noModelsFound: No models found, please check configuration or enter manually.
ai.noModelsFoundOpenAI: No models found: Some OpenAI Compatible APIs don't support /v1/models, you can enter manually.
ai.linkDescriptionSystemPrompt: You are a website description assistant. Output only the description text; do not output marker words, quotes, or any extra content.
ai.linkDescriptionUserPrompt:
Title: {{title}}
URL: {{url}}

Write a short English description of this website (max 15 words) explaining what it does.

Output rules:
- Output only the description text
- Do not output quotes, prefixes, or suffixes
- Do not output marker words like FINISH, Done, END, etc.
- Do not output any explanations or extra text
ai.missingApiKey: Please configure API Key in Settings
ai.apiError: AI service call failed, please try again later
ai.configureAndSaveApiKeyFirst: Please configure and save API Key first
ai.bulkGenerateConfirmMessage_one: Found {{count}} link without description. Do you want to use AI to auto-generate it? This may take some time.
ai.bulkGenerateConfirmMessage_other: Found {{count}} links without descriptions. Do you want to use AI to auto-generate them? This may take some time.
ai.connectionFailedGemini: Connection failed: Please check model name and API Key
ai.connectionFailedOpenAI: Connection failed: Please check Base URL/Model/API Key. If blocked by CORS, please use Workers/Pages deployment to enable /api/ai proxy.

data.title: Data Management
data.cloudSyncDesc: Data changes will automatically sync to Cloudflare KV for real-time multi-device sync
data.apiPasswordHint: For enhanced security, set the SYNC_PASSWORD environment variable in Cloudflare Pages dashboard and enter the same password here.
data.loginFailed: Login failed: Wrong password or no permission
data.enterPasswordToLogin: Please enter password and click Login
data.loginLocked: Login locked, please try again after {{time}}
data.loginFailedLocked: Login failed: Too many incorrect attempts, please try again after {{time}}
data.noPasswordProtection: No password protection: All visitors have admin privileges by default.
data.privacyGroupDisabledHint: Privacy group will not show in sidebar when disabled
data.passwordDisabledHint: Password protection disabled, privacy group will auto-unlock
data.autoUnlockHint: Only valid for current tab, auto-locks when tab is closed
data.setSyncPasswordFirst: Please set sync password before enabling separate password.
data.enterPasswordsToSwitch: Please enter old and new passwords to complete the switch.
data.switchFailed: Switch failed, please check password and try again
data.syncHistoryHint: To save Cloudflare KV quota, auto-sync does not write records by default; manual sync/restore will generate records.
data.syncHistoryNote: Note: Click statistics and other 'stats-only sync' will sync to cloud but won't write to sync history (to avoid clutter).
data.syncHistoryDefaultHidden: Sync history is not loaded by default. Click 'Show' to fetch the last 20 sync records from cloud.
data.userModeNoHistory: Sync history is not shown in user mode. Enter admin password to view, restore, export and delete records (current record cannot be deleted).
data.restoreBackupMessage: This will overwrite local data with the selected backup and create a rollback point in the cloud.
data.restoreBackupFailed: Restore failed, please try again later
data.restoreBackupSuccess: Restored to the selected backup and created a rollback point
data.deleteBackupMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this backup? This action cannot be undone.
data.deleteBackupFailed: Delete failed, please try again later
data.importDataHint: Supports Chrome HTML bookmarks or JSON backup import
data.exportFailed: Export failed, please try again later

syncConflict.title: Data Conflict Detected
syncConflict.description: Cloud data has been updated by another device. Please choose which version to keep.
syncConflict.hint: Tip: After selection, the other version will be overwritten. To keep both, please export local data first before choosing cloud version.

countdown.title: Title
countdown.timeZoneHint: IANA time zones, e.g. Asia/Shanghai, America/New_York
countdown.naturalInputPlaceholder: e.g. next Fri, in 3 days, monthly on 15th, weekdays, 腊月二十三, 立春
countdown.cronHint: Supports 5 or 6 fields (with seconds). Evaluated in the selected time zone.

countdown.archiveDelayHint: Expired one-time reminders will be auto-archived after specified minutes
